Based on the user's message, they seem interested in musicals. Here are some highly rated musical movies that you may enjoy:

1. La La Land (2016) - Starring Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling, this epic love story set against the backdrop of Hollywood is a masterpiece.

2. Mamma Mia! (2008) - Directed by赵婷, this heartwarming tale follows the life of ABBA supergroup, and it's simply amazing.

3. Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again (2014) - Directed once again by赵婷, this encore edition to the Mamma Mia! franchise features a new cast of characters, including a young woman named Lisa who dreams of being a singer like ABBA supergroup.

Overall, La La Land and Mamma Mia! are two of the most iconic musical movies ever made. Both movies feature powerful performances by some of the most talented actors in Hollywood today.

conversation.text:
La La Land is a musical romantic comedy-drama film directed by Damien Chazelle. The film stars Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling as an aspiring actress and a jazz pianist who fall in love despite their odds.
Mamma Mia! is a 2008 musical film based on the jukebox musical "Mamma Mia!". The film stars Amanda Seyfried, Miley Cyrus, Kristen Bell, and Zac Efron as the five daughters of Donna Sheridan (Seyfried) and her late husband Sam (Efron).
Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again is a 2017 musical film based on the jukebox musical "Mamma Mia!". The film stars Amanda Seyfried, Miley Cyrus, Kristen Bell, and Zac Efron as the five daughters of Donna Sheridan (Seyfried) and her late husband Sam (Efron).
The Greatest Showman is a 2017 biographical musical drama film directed by Benjamine Ferris and Justin Falvey. The film stars Hugh Jackman as P.T. Barnum, Zac Efron as Billy the Kid, Michelle Yeoh as Yang Junying, and Tom Hanks as James M. McPherson.
Chicago is a 1975 American musical film directed by Richard Permut and Joel Schumacher. The film stars Daniel Radcliffe as Harry Potter, Emma Watson as Hermione Granger, Ramanujam Mathew (Mathew Ramu), Michael Gambon (Sirius Black), and Ralph Fiennes (Albus Dumbledore).
The Sound of Music is a 1965 American musical film directed by Robert Wise and Martin Balsam. The film stars Julie Andrews as Maria, Shirley MacDowell as Anna, Barbra Streisand as Carol, David Tomkins as Joseph, and Charles Grover as the Colonel.
Dreamgirls is a 2006 American musical drama film directed by James Ivory. The film stars Jennifer Hudson as Diana, Beyoncé Knowles-Carter as Shereya Nulag, Jamie Foxx as Curtis "Hustle" Johnson III, and地上最强的女人，玛丽亚·凯莉。
Cinderella is a 1950 American musical comedy-drama film directed by Robert Zemeckis. The film stars Vivien Leigh as Cinderella, Cary Grant as Prince Charming, James Stewart as Bert, John Smith as Bill, and Charles Laughton as Grandfather.
Beauty and the Beast is a 1998 American romantic fantasy film directed by Kevin James. The film stars Daniel Day-Lewis as Beast, Uma Thurman as Princess Belle, Jeremy Irons as Fairy Godmother, and John Hurt as Beast's Father.
West Side Story is a 1967 American musical drama film directed by Roman Polanski. The film stars Richard Burton as Tony, Audrey Hepburn as Elizabeth, Larry Haguer as Herron, Melvin Douglas as Mr. Gruen, and Stephen Bonano as the Policeman.
Moulin Rouge! is a 2012 Australian musical film directed by Baz Luhrmann. The film stars Ewan McGregor as Guy Champion Charlemagne de Nucingen, Nicole Kidman as皇后、Liza Minnelli（去世）as Tilly维护，Michael Gambon as Lord Mayor of Melbourne, David Strathairn as Prime Minister of Australia, and Jack Thompson (去世) as the Assistant Attorney General at the Department of Justice of the United States.
Rocketman is a 2019 American musical biographical film directed by John Reiner. The film stars Tom Hanks as Jimmie Martin, Jennifer Lawrence as Sue Smith, Donald Sutherland as Mr. Smith, and James Brolin as Hank Martin, the elder half of the famous music duo The Jacksons.
Bohemian Rhapsody is a 2018 British biographical musical drama film directed by Bryan Singer. The film stars Rami Malek as Freddie Mercury, Lucy Liu as Mary Austin, John de复活(去世) as Paul Stanley, and Idris Elba as Brian Wilson.
A Star Is Born is a 1976 American musical drama film directed by David Lean. The film stars Robert Redford as Jack Carson, George Macdonald Smith as Dr. Norman Thomas, and Sidney Poitier as Louis Jordan.
Pitch Perfect is a 2012 American musical comedy film directed by Jason Reiner. The film stars Anna Kendrick as Beca-core, Rebel Wilson as Fat Bastard, Jonah Hill as Eric "E" Stine Jr., and Brittany Snow as Cynthia "C" Bower.

The Sound of Music is a 1967 American musical drama film directed by Roman Polanski
